name: 蔡佩芳
objective: 本課程介紹作業研究中網路與整數模式、以及機率性模式之各項基本概念及應用，包含網路模式、整數規劃、動態規劃、賽局原理、馬可夫鏈、專案管理等。
schedule:
Week 1~3. Transportation & Assignment Models
Week 4~6. Network Optimization Models, Project Management
Week 7~8. Integer Programming
Week 10~11. Game Theory
Week 12~13. Decision Analysis
Week 14~17. Markov Chain
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 10%
Quizes:　　   20%
Homeworks: 20%
Mid-term Exams: 　　25%
Final Exam:　　　　25%.
materials: Hillier, F.S. and Lieberman, G.J. (2010), Introduction to Operations Research, 9th Edition, McGraw-Hill Int’l, Taipei. (required)
